Function Documentation

databaseGetAllModules (  $  checkReqs = false  ) 
 

Returns all available modules. If $checkReqs is true it checks of that all requirements (PHP extensions) are installed.

Parameters:
$checkReqs (bool) Check that all PHP extensions are installed.
Returns:
array (string) all modules.
